Nullbird: This is Nullbird. A strange, quirky AI researcher, who is also a furry. (or would that be a feathery?)
Ravenette: This is Ravenette. A sentient AI which, for some reason, caws randomly. It runs on a small tablet, and controls an avatar of an expressive cartoon raven.
Lithocles: This is Lithocles. A strange AI which never seems to stop prattlilng on about philosophy.
Vaugebot: This AI never seems to give a straight answer. You don't think any of it is true.
Grue: This creature, once only relegated to fantasy text-based aventure games, was brought into reality by a mad scientist years ago. Since then, the grue has expanded to infest whole cities.
